Text:
My faforite band. But this is not a NEW MODEL ARMY 
release. See for your self at.  http://www.newmodelarmy.org/fhome.htm
No new tracks her

It's NMA alright, but not a 2006-release. It's "The Collection", released in 2004. The songs are listed in a different order on this torrent though.

Link to the "real" album: http://www.amazon.co.uk/-Collection/dp/B0002YI542/ref=pd_sxp_f_i/202-2980432-3578237?ie=UTF8
